# Brawler
## Overview
*Brawler*: While raging, the barbarian is treated as if she has [[Improved Unarmed Strike (Feat)|Improved Unarmed Strike]]. If she already has the feat, her unarmed strikes deal 1d6 points of damage (1d4 if she is Small).

**Source:** Advanced Player's Guide, pg. 74
